ygData.subject: RE: Melee binding compromise (was:RE: Hey this sounded  interesting..)
ygData.msgSnippet: Rokenn s idea sounds good to me. BTW, what is the current resurrection effect? I ve never been resurrected so don t know what the penalty is.  How long does it
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn's idea sounds good to me.

BTW, what is the current resurrection effect? I've never been resurrected so
don't know what the penalty is. How long does it take you to fully recover
your stats? Does playing the stamina song increase your rate of receovery?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [SMTP:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 6:05 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Melee binding compromise (was:RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded
> interesting..)
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> >From: <kim@...>
> >On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
> > >
> > > > How about just having us re-pop with say 50HP
> > >
> > > Not a bad idea, but 30-50% health would be better
> > > in my personal opinion. 50 hp to a high level
> > > player out of their total of over 1000 would
> > > simply be unrealistic. But it's a good idea
> > > all the same.
> >
> >50 hp would certainly make casters think twice about binding
> >outside of city zones. :-)
> >
> >--
> >John H. Kim
> >kim@...
>
> How is this for a compromise. When you respawn you have the current rez
> effect, plus you only have 10% of your max HPs. Then change the binding
> rules to allow casters to bind anyone, anywhere (with a yes/no box). I
> feel
> this would balance the risk/reward factor, and make it so people could not
>
> use suicide binding tactics when fighting Dragons and such.
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
>
>
